questions.title: Xbox Series X or Nintendo Switch?
questions.description: Hey guys, I'm in a bit of a conundrum here in making a decision for myself. I'm looking for a game console I can play at work, and it's come down to the Xbox Series X and the Nintendo Switch. Honestly would have chosen the PS5 but they're like finding a unicorn or a needle in a haystack, so that's out of the question

answers.description: Of the two options, I'd go with Switch since it gets the Nintendo exclusives. Series X seems like a lot of money for a part time console that only gives you access to the same games your PC already covers.

I've seen a lot of people suggest Steam Deck on this sub for various reasons. It's a great piece of hardware for sure, but if you put in an order now you're likely waiting at least several months if not more than a year, and I suspect most people asking these questions are wondering what's their best option now, not a year from now.
